file_content.text: You heard what's happened, right? You outrank me, so I assume you've heard.
Don't think because your side's in charge of this base that you can boss me around.
Havoc Squad. We got Havoc Squad. You have any idea how big this is?
Radio silence?
So you're the one with all the connections. Let's hear it.
So now that terrorist is out there, somewhere in the galaxy, right? Plotting.
Good riddance, wouldn't you say? One more terrorist in the dirt.
Don't you dare gloat.
We might actually pull this off.
We're dead, aren't we? We're all dead.
Don't think you get to boss me around. Remember which side's in charge of this base.
Private, is it? Maybe you're not aware, Private, but this is an alliance. There are no sides.
That's what they keep telling us, but you know it as well as I do.
Saying something's true is one thing. But it has to feel true, and it doesn't.
Exactly right. Exactly right. And so we're clear, Corporal, your rank means nothing to me. Less than nothing.
Can we skip to the part where you tell me what you're going to tell me anyway?
I knew you didn't know. That Zakuulan pilot, he up and left us. Real show of confidence.
How's it feel knowing your Commander's brought a known terrorist into the fold?
SCORPIO.
SCORPIO.
Pretty much.
Nice to see you're optimistic for once.
"For once." Right. And you're always a ray of sunshine.
The Alliance is bigger than ever, we've shown again and again we can hurt the Eternal Empire.... Know what that says to me?
This should be good.
It says to me, we might actually pull this off.
I'm not--I wasn't--Look, I'm sorry it's come to this for--you know, for your hero. But you have to respect the chain of command. The Alliance Commander--
So execute anyone who doesn't agree with you every time. Oh, that makes perfect sense!
I'll... talk to you when you're less upset.
Can't wait.
I don't want to hear it from you. Is that clear?
Perfectly.
Right. One more terrorist in the dirt.
Come on now. You hated having her around, too.
Kill people left and right, you're a born leader and everyone wants to follow you. The Imperial way.
No, you're right, of course. Much better to keep her alive and remain a danger to everyone, everywhere!
She knows everything about our camp.
There's nowhere safe anymore.
There never was. Just the illusion.
I thought you were going to tell me something.
I heard we got something, but not what.
Uh-huh. That's all I heard, too.
You mean, from me. Just now.
So I don't always get the scoop....
Nothing. Commander's back, at least there's that.
Never gets any easier, the waiting. More you try to think of anything else....
Maybe a game of pazaak's in order.
I never learned how.
Serious? How is it a soldier--? Know what? I'll teach you.
Spare me your patriotism, if that's what this is.
No, that would make me like you, and.... No. But this will legitimize us in the eyes of the Republic.
Well, he's one person--not even our only Zakuulan. We're still growing. That's what matters.
Except he was part of the inner circle. Makes you wonder--what's he know that we don't that made him hit the trail?
She's our Commander, and I trust her judgment.
He's our Commander, and I trust his judgment.
So you don't think we should keep an eye on the Rattataki.
I didn't say that....
A known terrorist welcomed with open arms. That isn't how the Empire operates.
This isn't the Sith Empire, but... yeah, I hear you. There has to be a good reason. Still....
Vigilance.
Vigilance.
Unless they've gone rogue.
Why would you say that? What have you heard?
Nothing. Nothing at all.
We did it. We actually did it.
You mean, the Commander did it. All we did was cloud gaze and hope for the best.
Don't tell me you're disappointed. You wanted Arcann to invade Odessen?
I don't know. It would have been exciting.
I'll never understand Imperials. Come on--let's hit the cantina. I, for one, want to celebrate.
As long as you're buying.
